extensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

extensionDescription.message: Adblock seguro e consciente da privacidade para YouTube™. Bloquea anuncios en YouTube.com.

timesaveInfo.message: Adblock para Youtube™ gardouse aprox. $savedTime$ da túa vida.
timesaveInfo.description: Tells the user how many time he saved already.

displayVideoBranding.message: Mostra a información da extensión a continuación do vídeo

displayActionCountAsBadgeText.message: Mostrar o reconto de solicitudes bloqueadas na insignia
